Ok, that's weird. This film is a bizarre splicing of the two Arn movies, the Knight Templar and the Kingdom at Road's End. The subs work for the original Arn - Tempelriddaren, which can be found here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4224446/Arn.Tempelriddaren.2007.SWEDiSH.DVDRip.XviD-MoA
